alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Peach; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Bibb, southwestern Twiggs, eastern Peach, northern Houston and east central Crawford Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Powerville, or near Fort Valley, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Robins AFB, Marion, Tarversville, Robins Air Force Base, Jack Brown Estates, Bullard, Houston Lake, Lakewood, Huber, Powerville, Elberta, Middle Georgia Regional Airport, Bonaire, Miami Valley, and Kathleen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
